note.p: Civil servant. Matriculated as a pensioner at Trinity College, Cambridge, 1852. Clerk at the Board of Trade, 1861. Robert FitzRoy’s assistant in the Meteorological Department. American merchant living at Eastham, Cheshire, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/667/6/3), 1881 (RG11/3569/10/13)
